definition: a winch (or system of winches) powered by an engine and used to haul logs from a stump to a landing or to a skid road
details:
noun
- a winch (or system of winches) powered by an engine and used to haul logs from a stump to a landing or to a skid road
= synonyms: yard donkey
- the height or length of something in yards, used only in combinations
= example: the height or length of something in yards, used only in combinations
